  • Method Details

    • CreateAndShowOrderScreen

      public static void CreateAndShowOrderScreen()
      Creates GUI that allows order submissions for servers
      Throws:
      Exception - fail safe if side is not retrieved

    • AddButton

      public static void AddButton(JPanel buttons, MenuItem item, int index, GridBagConstraints c)
      Creates buttons for menu items available for ordering
      Parameters:
      buttons - JPanel - panel of menu items available for order
      item - MenuItem - menu item to be added to order screen
      index - Integer - used to determine position of button on the panel
      c - GridBagConstraints - necessary parameter to use GridBagConstraints

    • AddToOrder

      public static void AddToOrder(MenuItem item)
      Event handler for AddButton() method

      Adds menu item to order once the corresponding button is pressed

      Also allows user to increment or decrement the number of specific menu items that were added to the order

      Parameters:
      item - MenuItem - menu item that is added to the customer order upon button press

    • SubmitOrder

      public static void SubmitOrder(JButton submit, JButton cancel)
      Button for submitting a completed order
      Parameters:
      submit - JButton - button for finalizing and submitting an order
      cancel - JButton - button for clearing all additions to an order
      Throws:
      Exception - fail safe if call to backend is unsuccessful

    • refresh

      public static void refresh(JButton submit, JButton cancel)
      Event Handler for submitOrder() method

      Actually submits order information to make relevant changes to the database or clears order

      Parameters:
      submit - JButton - button for submitting an order
      cancel - JButton - button for clearing an order
